EmplacedAntiTank68.name: Leary Shellbore 68mm
EmplacedAntiTank68.description: A defensive emplacement with a 68mm Anti-Tank cannon. This rudimentary weapon was once built to fit onto the hull of large naval vessels, but was eventually pahsed out and repurposed.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Gunner: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

ArtilleryExalt.name: Huber Exalt 150mm
ArtilleryExalt.description: A heavy cannon designed to shatter the garrisons and fortifications of advancing forces. The Exalt is best utilized when emplaced into a defensive position to take advantage of it's impressive range.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Cannoneer: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

EmplacedMachinegunSnareTrap.name: Leary Snare Trap 127
EmplacedMachinegunSnareTrap.description: The Snare Trap is a repurposed anti-aircraft flak cannon used to fortify emplaced positions with twin anti-infantry machine guns.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Machine Gun: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot
Causes suppressed enemy players to lose stability

ArtilleryLariat.name: Huber Lariat 120mm
ArtilleryLariat.description: A light artillery cannon designed to be a fixture in defensive fortifications. The Lariat sports a formidibable long-range 120mm cannon designed to put immense pressure on enemy infantry.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Cannoneer: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

ArtilleryThunderbolt.name: 50-500 "Thunderbolt" Cannon
ArtilleryThunderbolt.description: This heavy artillery cannon is designed to cripple enemy fortifications from an entrenched position. Its long heavy barrel gives the "Thunderbolt" outstanding range.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Cannoneer: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ContainerMaterial.name: Resource Container
ContainerMaterial.description: A container that can carry large quantities of resources and can be transpoted by certain vehicles.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ContainerCrate.name: Shipping Container
ContainerCrate.description: A container for shipping very large quantities of Crates using Crane loaded vehicles. This typ of container can only be unloaded at Storage Depots and Seaports.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

EmplacedAntiTankARC.name: DAE 1o-3 "Polybolos"
EmplacedAntiTankARC.description: To combat Caoivish ingenuity, the Meseans developed their own indirect RPG propulsion system. Dual launchers are fitted on a large emplacement platform to maximize coverage in an established position, rather than being relegated to a guerilla warfare tool.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

EmplacedMachinegunSerra.name: DAE 1b-2 "Serra"
EmplacedMachinegunSerra.description: Built like a saw blade, the DAE 1b-2 emplacement gun is fitted with three cascading machine gun turrets. What the "Serra" lacks in power, it makes up for in sheer rate of fire for a weapon of its size.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Machine Gun: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot
Causes suppressed enemy players to lose stability

ConcreteMixer.name: Concrete Mixer
ConcreteMixer.description: A portable device that mixes various materials to form Concrete, which are used to build heavily fortified structures.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

FuelContainer.name: Liquid Container
FuelContainer.description: Stores a high volume of liquids, supporting a variety of fuel types. Nearby structures or vehicles can be refueled directly from this container.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
